title: Basque-ing in the glory: Bilbao’s Tour de France 2023 fans
content:
Cyclist
Basque-ing in the glory: Bilbao’s Tour de France 2023 fans

The 2023 Tour de France has begun with a bang as brothers Adam and Simon Yates delivered a stunning one-two in Bilbao, after 182 rather lumpy kilometres.

The race began in the city to all the usual fanfare before taking a tour of the lush Basque countryside, throwing in a number of punchy climbs along the way.

The fans were out in force in the city under mostly cloudy skies, and Cyclist’s Charlotte Head and Matthew Loveridge were on hand to capture all the colour, excitement, and dogs.

Stay tuned for lots more coverage including behind-the-scenes tech from the pits, pro bike galleries and more.
